net.tridentsdk.server.encryption

Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.encryption.RSA

  • public final class RSA
extends java.lang.Object
    Produces RSA encryption digests

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] decrypt(byte[] data, java.security.Key key)
      Decrypts the data into the cipher with the given key
      static byte[] decrypt(byte data, java.security.Key key)
      Decrypts the data into the cipher with the given key, copied into a single element byte array
      static byte[] encrypt(byte[] data, java.security.Key key)
      Encrypts the data into the cipher with the given key
      static byte[] encrypt(byte data, java.security.Key key)
      Encrypts the data into the cipher with the given key, which is copied to a single element byte array
      static java.security.KeyPair generate(int bits)
      Generates a KeyPair with the specified amount of bits using an RSA cipher

      • generate

        public static java.security.KeyPair generate(int bits)
                                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates a KeyPair with the specified amount of bits using an RSA cipher
        Parameters:
        bits - the bits in the final digest for the KeyPair
        Returns:
        the KeyPair that has the specified bits and RSA cipher
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if RSA cipher is removed in the future
